duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and deliver data quality best practices and tools for a world-class Data Quality operation.
Participate in architecture, design, analysis, and evangelizing activities for data quality.
Recognize business risk and surface it to key decision-makers.
Implement processes and tools for data quality, helping deliver an industry best-practice solution for input data quality to production systems and quant models.
Produce stand-alone tools for automation of data quality and fault discovery.
Guide support and data onboarding teams to best practices, and consult on root-cause analysis and data architecture decisions.
Direct and mentor junior engineers on the data quality team to help the team scale.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (or higher) in Computer Science, Management Information Systems, Business Information Systems, Mathematics or Finance related field
